name: User Registration
description: Allow users to create accounts, providing their personal information and blood type.

name: Blood Donation Search
description: Implement a search functionality for users to find nearby blood donation centers or events.

name: Donor Profiles
description: Enable donors to create profiles, showcasing their donation history and encouraging others.

name: Notification System
description: Incorporate a notification system to alert users about upcoming donation events or urgent blood needs.

name: Blood Type Compatibility
description: Include a feature that helps match donors with recipients based on blood type compatibility.

name: Donation Tracking
description: Provide a tracking system for donors to monitor and review their donation history and impact.
